overview: Forget romance, guys – these boys like a bit of bite when it comes to their sexual antics. More precisely, they like their fun on the wet side. In fact, they’re not happy until they’ve washed their jizz away with oodles of hot piss. Ennio Guardi joins fellow piss whores Yuri Adamov, Johny Cruz and Sam Williams for some of the wettest, kinkiest action around; culminating in a piss-fiesta that will quite literally get all you golden-shower fanatics into top-notch overdrive! It’s gonna be warm, it’s gonna be wet – but most of all it’s gonna be fuckin’ hot!
title: Piss Whores
